subject: Economy
question_en: What is the term for the annual financial plan of a country?
question_hi: देश के एक साली अर्थशास्त्र क्या कहना होता है?
explanation_en: Annual financial plan of a country is called the budget. In Hindi, it is referred to as 'व्यापी'.
explanation_hi: देश का एक वर्षीय व्यापी (विवेक) क्या है?
